title: Precipitation enhancement of liquid thermoelectric conversion with Fe(ClO4)2/Fe(ClO4)3 dissolved in DMF
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3YA00516J, Paper
Open Access

Akihiko Wake, Dai Inoue, Yukata Moritomo
The electrochemical Seebeck coefficient $\alpha$ is one of the parameters that determine the performance of liquid thermoelectric conversion device (LTE).We systematically investigated α in N,N-dimethylformamide (DMF) containing Fe(ClO4)2/Fe(ClO4)3 against the...
